description: Multiple items: Each document has multiple line items referencing different PO lines

expected_groups.reasoning: INV-S09-001 references lines A,B. DR-S09-001 references A,C,E. DR-S09-002 references B,D. Shared lines A and B connect these documents.
INV-S09-002 references lines C,D. DR-S09-001 references A,C,E. DR-S09-002 references B,D. Shared lines C and D connect these documents.

notes: This demonstrates complex overlapping groups where documents share some but not all PO lines. INV-S09-001 and INV-S09-002 do NOT share PO lines directly, but are connected through the delivery receipts.
